vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_18.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_18.sol#27)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_18.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#26-30)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_18.sol#28)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_18.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_18.sol#29)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_18.sol#16-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_18.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_18.sol#20)
